pkgmetadata.longdescription:
"Murrine" is an Italian word meaning the glass artworks done by Venicians glass blowers. They're absolutely wonderful and colorful.
Murrine has this object to provide the ability to make your desktop look like a "Murrina", which is the Italian singular of the name "Murrine".
The Engine is cairo-based, and it's very fast compared to clearlooks-cairo and ubuntulooks (30% faster and more), since I have tried to optimize the code and removed a lot of slow gradients to provide this unique style.
